description: Hubitat Poller Cac (GridWorks Type). A class of devices - like a Honeywell Z-Wave T6 Thermostat - that can be polled through a Hubitat IoT hub.

ComponentAttributeClassId.description: Unique identifier for the device class (aka 'cac' or Component Attribute Class). Authority is maintained by the World Registry.

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.
